title: What we do hits HOME at Vermillion Apartments! 3 Bedroom Apt Available
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Welcome to better living.', 'Welcome to Vermillion.', 'Our 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes include spacious bedrooms with ample closet space, central air-conditioning, vaulted ceilings, vinyl wood planking & carpet flooring, and fully equipped kitchens!', 'Located just a short drive from Downtown Houston, near many dining, shopping, and entertainment options right outside of your front door.', 'Our community offers a sparkling outdoor pool, picnic & BBQ areas, outdoor playground, on-site laundry, & ample parking lot space!', 'Call our on-site professional management team TODAY to discuss coming in for a tour!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- High-Speed Internet & Cable Ready', '- New Walking Path with Seating & Lighting - COMING SOON!', '- Large Bedrooms with Walk-In Closets', '- Near Public Transportation', '- Vaulted Ceilings', '- 24-Hour Maintenance Service', '- Large Areas of Greenspace', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Vermillion Apartments participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $37,860 | 2 Occupants: $43,260 | 3', 'Occupants: $48,660 | 4', 'Occupants: $54,060 | 5 Occupants: $58,440 | 6', 'Occupants: $62,760.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Vermillion Apartments', '3360 Alice Street', 'Houston, TX, 77021', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'jU30jde8']
